line_1: Unpleas'd the Spring her flowery robe resume;
line_2: Unpleas'd ye see the thickets bloom,

line_1: When musing Mem'ry would each trace resume
line_2: But ah! not thine is Twilight's doubtful gloom,

line_1: When musing Mem'ry would each trace resume
line_2: Here instant darkness shrouds thy genial bloom,

line_1: But as time will not tarry, our course we resume,
line_2: And St. George's dragoons take their seats in our room:
